extension.summary: All the best from cCloud TV
extension.description: cCloud is an open source cloud based social IPTV service. It is built by the community for the community, where streaming is just a click away. Just click, play and stream. Yes, it's that simple. Just go to [COLOR blue]http://ccloudtv.org[/COLOR] and enjoy:) Please report any channels that are down here [COLOR blue]http://www.tiny.cc/reportchs[/COLOR] Users can now check servers status which can be found at [COLOR blue]http://ccloudtv.org/status[/COLOR]

extension.description: Direct playlists from youtube using other sites to index and then searching youtube for playlist content.[CR][CR]You will need the Youtube addon installed.

extension.summary: livestreamspro- shamelessly forked from livestreams but added many thinks
extension.description: In addition to what livestreams allowed you to do, you can now, 1. call regex in regex, 2. multiple regex in page, regex in session, also htmlunescape responses 3. create session from one regex and pass onto next in line 4. save sessions to a file and open again later 5. write python code in .py file, put in the profile directory and then call from your regex. 6. use epoctime, guid and unpack as functions already defined. 7. Use it to post values to the pages to get the proper responses 8. support many headers, like origin, X-Requested-With 9. you can now append cookies in response and then read in regex using includeheaders 10. You can now link to another web url via your xml using externallink 11. support for google captcha, now you can show and then post the text
As of May, 2018 this is a community maintained template for learning purposes.

extension.news:
6.1.3 [fix] timedelta.total_seconds python 2.6 compat.
6.1.2 [fix] dash settings check and defaults [fix] addon-check raised warning for services complex entry point [fix] codacy raised issue in http server (https://app.codacy.com/app/Kodi/repo-plugins/pullRequest?prid=2080401) [chg] move seek to onPlayBackStarted, onAVStarted only in K18 [chg] geolocation provider changed from ipstack to ip-api [del] frodo listitem art compatibility [lang] ru_ru strings |contrib: Burgaduk| [lang] zh_tw strings |contrib: Zankio|
6.1.1 [fix] http proxy using incorrect setting id causing 403 errors
6.1.0 [add] Multi-user support - Switch User folder (default: on) Settings -> Folders - User management (Add, Remove, Rename, Switch) Settings - Users - Signed in users are green, Current user has an * [add/upd] add data cache and optimize caching - add Settings -> Maintenance -> Clear data cache/Delete data cache - increase allowed cache size - database accesses per 50 videos: before: 70~100 after: 4~6 - load time of 50 videos w/ no cached videos: before: ~11.6 secs, after: ~3 secs - load time of 50 videos w/ all cached videos: before: ~0.8 secs, after: ~0.7 secs - cached size per 50 videos: before ~1MB, after ~550KB [add] Refresh after watching (default: off) Settings -> General [add] Completed Live folder (default: on) Settings -> Folders [add] Upcoming Live folder (default: on) Settings -> Folders [add] My Location folder (default: on) Settings -> Advanced -> Enable setup-wizard [add] Play count minimum percent (default: 85%) Settings -> General -> Play count minimum percent [add] Playback history (default: off) Settings -> Advanced -> Use playback history [add] Time since published for videos as item properties Property(PublishedSince), Property(PublishedLocal) |contrib: pannal| [add] Check My IP, Settings -> HTTP Server [add] Developer authentication, allowing add-ons to use their own access tokens - see youtube_authentication.py, youtube_registration.py, youtube_requests.py, and youtube_resolver.py [upd] YouTube UTC datetimes to local timezone |contrib: pannal| [upd] Localize API key errors, provide a more descriptive notification [fix] Add to YouTube watch history [fix] My Channel videos (Error 403) [fix] allow fallback to dash, when using Audio only [fix] Signature function not found error for some users [fix] Context Menu -> More -> Related Videos w/ Kodi 18 [fix] Sign In/Sign Out causing crash with Kodi 18 nightlies [fix] Channel 'mine' caching [fix] Time changing when playing generated dash [lang] es_es strings |contrib: roliverosc| [lang] el_gr strings |contrib: twilight0| [lang] nl_nl strings |contrib: Markman-B|

extension.description: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeonilta.
Complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
Redeseñado completamente para crear unha aparencia moderna ao tempo que mantén a sensación do clásico Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å tilby en moderne utforming, samtidig som den klassiske Aeon-følelsen er beholdt.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Modern görünüme kavuşturmak için baştan tasarlandı, klasik Aeon hissi korundu
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
完全的翻新設計以創造現代化的視覺感受，同時仍維持Aeon的經典外觀。
extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v6.0.1[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and/or improvements[CR][I]v6.1.3[/I][CR]- Update skin for latest Leia skin engine changes[CR]- Add Artwork Beef support[CR]- Compatibility for Global Search v8+ and drop support for older versions[CR]- [CR][I]v6.1.2[/I][CR]- Move Video OSD buttons above seekbar[CR]- Update VideoLyrics mod (thanks manfeed)[CR]- Misc PVR fixes and adjustments[CR]- Resize FSK rating images to fit in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Fixes for Rottentomatoes and Metacritic images and INFOlabels[CR]- Fullscreen Info updates, fixes, and changes[CR]- Use script.colorbox for blur in information dialogs[CR]- Rework DialogMusicInfo[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

extension.disclaimer: Die gebruik van hierdie byvoeging beteken dat jy ooreengekom met die diensvoorwaardes wat op geleë is http://developer.yahoo.com/weather/#terms
